content.description:
Directions: Suggested time - 10 minutes

Quae postquam Anchises natum per singula duxit,
incenditque animum famae venientis amore,
exin bella viro memorat quae deinde gerenda, 
Laurentesque docet populos urbemque Latini, 
et quo quemque modo fugiatque feratque laborem.
content.question: In this passage, Anchises is speaking to his son. Where does the conversation take place?

frqParts.text: In this passage, Anchises is speaking to his son. Where does the conversation take place?

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
